Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 56th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 2006...
Traded from Milwaukee to Cincinnati on 7/24/2006 (Going to CIN: C M. Montero, P L. Carter, 1B C. Floyd, 3B D. Valencia, P D. Bard. Going to MIL: P N. Rodriguez, 1B S. Casey)...
Injured on 8/12/2006 with a Bruised Heel, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/8/2008 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Injured on 4/14/2010 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/25/2013 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/14/2015, off Oscar Villarreal (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/2015, off Scott Mathieson (PIT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/21/2015, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 9/1/2016...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 9/5/2016...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2017...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/11/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $480,000 per year...
